00031 class OPENRAVE_API KinBody : public InterfaceBase

00033 public:
00035     enum KinBodyProperty {
00036         Prop_Joints=0x1,     
00037         Prop_JointLimits=0x2|Prop_Joints,     
00038         Prop_JointOffset=0x4|Prop_Joints,
00039         Prop_JointProperties=0x8|Prop_Joints,     
00040         Prop_Links=0x10,     
00041         Prop_Name=0x20,     
00042         Prop_LinkDraw=0x40,     
00043         Prop_LinkGeometry=0x80|Prop_Links,     
00044         Prop_JointMimic=0x100|Prop_Joints,     
00045         Prop_JointAccelerationVelocityLimits=0x200|Prop_Joints,     
00046         Prop_LinkStatic=0x400|Prop_Links,     
00047         // robot only
00048         Prop_RobotManipulators = 0x00010000,     
00049         Prop_Manipulators = 0x00010000,
00050         Prop_RobotSensors = 0x00020000,     
00051         Prop_Sensors = 0x00020000,
00052         Prop_RobotSensorPlacement = 0x00040000,     
00053         Prop_SensorPlacement = 0x00040000,
00054         Prop_RobotActiveDOFs = 0x00080000,     
00055         Prop_RobotManipulatorTool = 0x00100000, 
00056     };

00387     class OPENRAVE_API Joint : public boost::enable_shared_from_this<Joint>
00388     {
00389 public:
00398         enum JointType {
00399             JointNone = 0,
00400             JointHinge = 0x01,
00401             JointRevolute = 0x01,
00402             JointSlider = 0x11,
00403             JointPrismatic = 0x11,
00404             JointRR = 0x02,
00405             JointRP = 0x12,
00406             JointPR = 0x22,
00407             JointPP = 0x32,
00408             JointSpecialBit = 0x80000000,
00409             JointUniversal = 0x80000001,
00410             JointHinge2 = 0x80000002,
00411             JointSpherical = 0x80000003,
00412         };
00413

00671         struct OPENRAVE_API MIMIC
00672         {
00673             struct DOFFormat
00674             {
00675                 int16_t jointindex;         
00676                 int16_t dofindex : 14;         
00677                 uint8_t axis : 2;         
00678                 bool operator <(const DOFFormat& r) const;
00679                 bool operator ==(const DOFFormat& r) const;
00680                 boost::shared_ptr<Joint> GetJoint(KinBodyPtr parent) const;
00681                 boost::shared_ptr<Joint const> GetJoint(KinBodyConstPtr parent) const;
00682             };
00683             std::vector< DOFFormat > _vdofformat;         
00684             struct DOFHierarchy
00685             {
00686                 int16_t dofindex;         
00687                 uint16_t dofformatindex;         
00688                 bool operator ==(const DOFHierarchy& r) const {
00689                     return dofindex==r.dofindex && dofformatindex == r.dofformatindex;
00690                 }
00691             };
00692             std::vector<DOFHierarchy> _vmimicdofs;         
00693             boost::shared_ptr<FunctionParserBase<dReal> > _posfn;
00694             std::vector<boost::shared_ptr<FunctionParserBase<dReal> > > _velfns, _accelfns;         
00695             boost::array< std::string, 3>  _equations;         
00696         };
00697         boost::array< boost::shared_ptr<MIMIC>,3> _vmimic;          
00698 
00706         virtual void _ComputePartialVelocities(std::vector<std::pair<int,dReal> >& vpartials, int iaxis, std::map< std::pair<MIMIC::DOFFormat, int>, dReal >& mapcachedpartials) const;
00707 
00719         virtual void _ComputeInternalInformation(LinkPtr plink0, LinkPtr plink1, const Vector& vanchor, const std::vector<Vector>& vaxes, const std::vector<dReal>& vcurrentvalues);
